name: Eye of Perception
desc: A dim black glaze pearl that is said to have the power to read the purity of one's heart.

values.desc: Normal and Charged Attacks have a 50% chance to fire a Bolt of Perception, dealing <color=#99FFFFFF>240%</color> ATK as DMG. This bolt can bounce between opponents a maximum of 4 times. This effect can occur once every <color=#99FFFFFF>12</color>s.

Normal and Charged Attacks have a 50% chance to fire a Bolt of Perception, dealing <color=#99FFFFFF>270%</color> ATK as DMG. This bolt can bounce between opponents a maximum of 4 times. This effect can occur once every <color=#99FFFFFF>11</color>s.

Normal and Charged Attacks have a 50% chance to fire a Bolt of Perception, dealing <color=#99FFFFFF>300%</color> ATK as DMG. This bolt can bounce between opponents a maximum of 4 times. This effect can occur once every <color=#99FFFFFF>10</color>s.

Normal and Charged Attacks have a 50% chance to fire a Bolt of Perception, dealing <color=#99FFFFFF>330%</color> ATK as DMG. This bolt can bounce between opponents a maximum of 4 times. This effect can occur once every <color=#99FFFFFF>9</color>s.

Normal and Charged Attacks have a 50% chance to fire a Bolt of Perception, dealing <color=#99FFFFFF>360%</color> ATK as DMG. This bolt can bounce between opponents a maximum of 4 times. This effect can occur once every <color=#99FFFFFF>8</color>s.
